data.lyric:
[ti:Hero]
[ar:Cash Cash/Christina Perri]
[al:Blood, Sweat & 3 Years]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hero - Cash Cash/Christina Perri
[00:01.32]Lyrics by：Alex Makhlouf / Jean Paul Makhlouf / Samuel Frisch / Christina Perri
[00:02.64]Composed by：Alex Makhlouf / Jean Paul Makhlouf / Samuel Frisch / Christina Perri
[00:03.96]I let my soul fall into you
[00:07.07]I never thought I'd fall right through
[00:10.32]I fell for every word you said
[00:13.55]
[00:16.69]You made me feel I needed you
[00:19.71]And forced my heart to think it's true
[00:22.94]But I found I'm powerless with you
[00:26.49]
[00:28.68]Now I don't need your wings to fly
[00:33.83]
[00:34.85]No I don't need a hand to hold in mine this time
[00:40.70]
[00:41.69]You held me down but I broke free
[00:44.88]I found the love inside of me
[00:47.87]Now I don't need a hero to survive
[00:52.55]Cause I already saved my life
[00:54.92]
[01:05.63]Cause I already saved my life
[01:08.00]I fell into your fantasy
[01:10.94]But that's all our love will ever be
[01:14.13]I lost hope in saving you and me
[01:17.66]
[01:20.67]You think I'm lost falling apart
[01:23.76]But your lies just made a stronger heart
[01:27.16]My life is just about to start
[01:31.86]
[01:32.69]Now I don't need your wings to fly
[01:37.84]
[01:38.84]No I don't need a hand to hold in mine this time
[01:44.74]
[01:45.63]You held me down but I broke free
[01:48.79]I found the love inside of me
[01:51.83]Now I don't need a hero to survive
[01:56.04]
[01:56.62]Cause I already saved my life
[01:59.19]
[02:00.34]Already saved my life
[02:03.29]I already saved my life
[02:05.82]
[02:06.75]Already saved my life
[02:09.19]
[02:09.72]I already saved my life
[02:11.84]
[02:23.91]Now I don't need your wings to fly
[02:28.91]
[02:30.15]No I don't need a hand to hold in mine this time
[02:35.82]
[02:36.94]You held me down but I broke free
[02:39.96]I found the love inside of me
[02:43.11]Now I don't need a hero to survive
[02:47.85]Cause I already saved my life
[02:50.11]
[02:51.59]Already saved my life
[02:54.57]I already saved my life
[02:56.96]
[02:57.96]Already saved my life
[03:00.93]I already saved my life
[03:05.36]Now I don't need your wings to fly
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:Cash Cash/Christina Perri]
[al:Blood, Sweat & 3 Years]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.32]//
[00:02.64]//
[00:03.96]我让自己变成你
[00:07.07]我从未想过 我将会错过你
[00:10.32]我对你说的每一个字
[00:13.55]
[00:16.69]你让我感觉我需要你
[00:19.71]我强迫着自己 认为这一切都是真的
[00:22.94]但是我发现 我们的爱情是多么的无力
[00:26.49]
[00:28.68]现在我不再需要你的翅膀去飞翔
[00:33.83]
[00:34.85]这次我不需要你抓紧我的手
[00:40.70]
[00:41.69]我挣脱了你的拥抱
[00:44.88]我已经发现爱在我的心里
[00:47.87]现在我不需要一个英雄去拯救
[00:52.55]因为我已经拯救了我的生活
[00:54.92]
[01:05.63]因为我已经拯救了我的生活
[01:08.00]我掉进了你的幻想
[01:10.94]以为我们的爱会永远
[01:14.13]最后希望拯救你和我
[01:17.66]
[01:20.66]你以为我会支离破碎
[01:23.76]但你的谎言使我的心更加坚定
[01:27.16]我的生活即将开始
[01:31.86]
[01:32.69]现在我不再需要你的翅膀去飞翔
[01:37.84]
[01:38.84]这次我不需要你抓紧我的手
[01:44.74]
[01:45.63]我挣脱了你的拥抱
[01:48.79]我已经发现爱在我的心里
[01:51.83]现在我不需要一个英雄来拯救我
[01:56.04]
[01:56.62]因为我已经拯救了我的生活
[01:59.19]
[02:00.34]已经拯救了我的生活
[02:03.29]我已经拯救了我的生活
[02:05.82]
[02:06.75]已经拯救了我的生活
[02:09.19]
[02:09.72]我已经拯救了我的生活
[02:11.84]
[02:23.91]现在我不再需要你的翅膀去飞翔
[02:28.91]
[02:30.15]这次我不需要你抓紧我的手
[02:35.82]
[02:36.94]我挣脱了你的拥抱
[02:39.96]我已经发现爱在我的心里
[02:43.11]现在我不需要一个英雄去拯救
[02:47.85]因为我已经拯救了我的生活
[02:50.11]
[02:51.59]已经拯救了我的生活
[02:54.57]我已经拯救了我的生活
[02:56.96]
[02:57.96]已经拯救了我的生活
[03:00.93]我已经拯救了我的生活
[03:05.36]现在我不再需要你的翅膀去飞翔
